html:
9.2.24  9:12 am   How many DISTINCT letters are in the title of your next video?

      something you should understand about my next video is that the title is not yet finalized. it's also not entirely certain which order the videos will be in, so it's not certain which video will be next

9.2.24  9:10 am   what's a word or phrase (or usage thereof) that you've grown to like lately that you didn't use before?

      mooi

9.2.24  8:58 am   what does music mean to you?

      it's hard to describe without using music itself

9.2.24  7:29 am   if you turn a box inside out, is the inside the outside and the outside the inside, or is the outside the outside and the inside the inside

      the previous outside is the new inside, and the previous inside is the new outside

9.2.24  7:12 am   I lost a button hole. Where am I gonna find a button hole. 

      around a button

9.2.24  6:55 am   how are you feeling?

      pretty good

9.2.24  3:47 am   in "what are the first 10 powers of two?" you forgot 2^0. or negative numbers for that matter. how did you know when to start?

      i didn't forget, i considered that, and i concluded that i should use the same logic as if someone said "count to 10". i think the expected answer in that case would be to start with 1, and proceed upward by integers. i used those same numbers as the exponents. therefore, 1024 was the last one, as expected, being well known as 2^10

9.2.24  2:21 am   do you think certain subcultures (goth, punk, etc) are music based, or do you need to have the political views associated with them? what if you only dress in their style?

      you can use those words ('punk' or 'goth') to describe any of the things you just mentioned. all the details you described can be included within the range of those words. you can even push the envelope a little...... you tell someone you have a punk dog, and that would give them at least a starting point for how to understand the dog before meeting the dog. but, like anything else, they're still gonna have to meet the dog to really get what you're talking about. and the same thing is true with all the other things you mentioned

9.2.24  2:00 am   i made a piano cover of your song, and i think it's pretty darn cool! how long have you been playing piano?

      as long as i can remember

9.2.24  1:46 am   I was intrigued when you recently said surrealism is a "mild connective agent that you only need from time to time".

     you left out the context. that was in the context of someone asking me whether i think i am a 'surrealist'. so the answer i gave was in relation to the work that i do

     What do you consider surrealism then? I had always understood it as a sort of thoughtless creation, like a spilling out of creation without premeditation or intent.

      i was thinking surrealism is something that really doesn't resemble anything that can be described in words. so i think what i was trying to say is, it's good to have more recognizable elements as anchors, and surrealism works perfectly well but if the whole thing is completely unidentifiable then you might feel a little lost. but it's important to remember that i did not bring up the word surrealism in this situation. so all of my analyses here are somewhat on the back foot, as i'm trying to incorporate the word (surrealist) originally suggested in the question, which might not be a word i would have chosen to use for anything

9.2.24  12:58 am   You okay with house cats? 

      sure. although it's not so great for me to live in that same house

9.2.24  12:15 am   How to cheer myself up?

      start your own tv show. actually on second thought i should stop giving advice. sometimes the things that would cheer me up are not necessarily the same things that would cheer other people up

9.1.24  11:38 pm   the funniest thing is when somebody walks into a glass door.  the second funniest thing is when a bird flies into a glass door

      what i think i'm hearing you say is, you think birds are nobody

9.1.24  11:03 pm   Imagine panpsychism, where everything is conscious (not thinking, conscious). If you had a device that allowed you to feel the experience of being various inanimate objects, what would you want to experience first. I'd want to experience being an entire beehive. 

      in that case, just for safety reasons, i should be you while you're being the beehive

9.1.24  10:44 pm   The anxiety and pressure that comes whenever I have an idea or impulse to create something, is like, unbearable. The more exciting and important the idea is, the more intense the fear is. usually completely ignore the creative impulse, and then I just feel so plagued and like I've failed at my mission in life. It happens so often over the years that it's developed into a distrust of myself. Any advice? Solidarity? 

      i am guessing this will work for you: start cultivating a continuous list of ideas. the more the better. what you'll find is, the coolest thing about ideas is that you never know which one is going to turn out which way. so it's actually fun to pepper an idea list with quite 'bad' or 'useless' ideas. you never know which ones are the winners anyway. but the real important thing here is you need to take the pressure off the individual idea. the list method is probably a great cure for that

9.1.24  10:19 pm   what are you planning for labor day, I might do labor

      usually i don't need to plan for labor day, because it barely has any practical effect on life. it's essentially just a Bank Holiday, which are all given special names in america because i guess they find it more festive somehow, to pretend to celebrate different things throughout the year. like a bank holiday, you just have to take into account that some public services will not be available on that monday. for example, sometimes i go to the town hall to ask them what town i am in, but if i know it's labor day then i know i won't be able to go until tuesday

9.1.24  10:17 pm   what does your music taste like

      you'll have to try it and see. if the taste could be described accurately any other way, then the music probably would not have needed to be created in the first place

9.1.24  9:50 pm   What does the color green taste like 

      green

9.1.24  9:29 pm   why do you respond "i'm not sure"

      sometimes i'll use that if i'm not sure what the answer is to the question. that's my way of being humble, honest, and stupid, all at the same time

9.1.24  9:13 pm   what do i do if i'm stuck in a well

      now is the perfect time to start a sit com

9.1.24  8:47 pm   can i meet you now

      maybe

9.1.24  8:18 pm   I woke up from such a vivid dream I thought a day had passed. Did I dream the day up or is everyone else just gaslighting me into thinking I dreamt that day up when it actuallu happened?

      it's a dream, but if you want you could gaslight everyone else into thinking it was real

9.1.24  7:00 pm   i havent been putting my clothes away after doing laundry. its hard to find motivation to do it when i could be doing other things

      i'll admit, it would be easier to put clothes 'away' if you actually thought they were going to remain in that location for a significant period of time

9.1.24  5:59 pm   thoughts on yourself

      the important thing here is to balance that with thoughts of the rest of the world, other than yourself

9.1.24  5:47 pm   whats the best day

      today

9.1.24  5:39 pm   what are the first 10 powers of two?

      2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512,1024

9.1.24  3:55 pm   do you like opera bill wurtz

      i've mostly never really seen or heard opera

9.1.24  3:22 pm   how to be a rock and not to roll

      if you can be a cube

9.1.24  1:41 pm   whats your favorite word

      to

9.1.24  11:16 am   Do you have any favorite quotes? What's a quote you would pick if you had to pick a senior quote at this point in your life?

      if i had to put a quote for a yearbook, i would probably say "how are you liking this yearbook so far"

9.1.24  11:14 am   Is crazy a feeling or an experience?

      it's an adjective

9.1.24  11:08 am   I have 3 ducks can I give you 4 of them and pay you the 2 back tomorrow?

      i'm not following your logic

9.1.24  10:47 am   why do we exist? You seem like a person who would know that answer?

      why wouldn't we exist?

9.1.24  8:10 am   why do people hate the number 13?? did the number 13 make em homeless or smomethg???

      13 makes people nervous because it's too high

9.1.24  8:03 am   Is this a question?

      yes

9.1.24  7:08 am   Riddle me

      the reason i created this website is so people can come here to get their riddles without me having to email them to everyone individually

9.1.24  5:39 am   Do you use autotune?

      no, but to be fair i also don't use any other brand of pitch correction

9.1.24  5:26 am   What are your favorite VST plugins?

      i can't think of any

9.1.24  2:57 am   art is just charity donations to reality 

      i don't see it that way

9.1.24  2:37 am   some 'jazz' fans believe that music is bad when it is too 'smooth jazz' or 'muzak'. do you think this complaint typically has merit. do you think such critics are living in a taxonomic prison

      yes, but it's not nearly as nice as the smooth taxonimic prison that their rivals live in

9.1.24  2:15 am   its raining what do i do?

      how about counting the drops

9.1.24  2:09 am   The "sun stage" scene from here comes the sun's music video (at 1:57 in) looks oddly like a stage from the video game Super Smash Bros. IDK if you play video games so I'm wondering if the resemblance is intentional or not.

      really it all just goes back to vaudeville

9.1.24  12:56 am   If a mute person uses sign language with one arm is that a speech impediment?

      no

9.1.24  12:41 am   give me a word

      of

9.1.24  12:34 am   How do you make a mojito?

      from 2 other mojitos





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

8.31.24  11:16 pm   was 2013 or 2014 a more impactful year when it came to the development of new home air purifiers

      i'm not sure

8.31.24  10:45 pm   do you keep a dream journal or analyse your dreams in any way?

     i do pay attention to them, and write them down if necessary

      are your videos inspired by dreams/surreal?

     dreams have an authenticity that's worth aspiring to

8.31.24  9:32 pm   what's your favorite album of all time?

      i'm honestly not quite sure what that is, but it sounds like a house decorating technique. i use a much different technique

8.31.24  8:10 pm   at what point does a noise become music?

      you have to fill out some paperwork

8.31.24  5:53 pm   what's your favourite type of liquid

      water
